name: FORG WANT LOVE
description:
Bee Bush Games present a ZX Spectrum game for (less than) pocket money price!

FORG has a problem. FORG wants all the love FORG can get, but they do not want to be touched.  I certainly know THAT feeling.

Simply reach the heart on each screen, then bring it back to the door. Easy right? But once FORG starts moving they will not stop until they hit a wall. Also those creatures all want to give FORG a big hug. NO TOUCH PLS!

Guide FORG through 17 screens across 3 areas. But beware, love is hard work...

Controls::
Z = Left
X = Right
P = Pause

You can also redefine the keys to your liking. Or use Sinclair/Kempston joysticks. Lucky you.

All art/design/music etc by @mrtom
Thanks to @Quantum_Sheep and @SuperRetroid for helping to test the game
